scripts.dev-linux: rm -rf dist && npm run build && node dist/src/index.js
scripts.dev-win: powershell Remove-Item dist -Recurse -Force && npm run build && node dist/src/index.js
scripts.setup-linux: chmod +x tools/setup/setupLocalDbContainer.sh &&  npm run db-local-linux && npm run restore-seed-db-linux
scripts.setup-win: npm run db-local-win && npm run restore-seed-db-win
scripts.restore-seed-db-linux: rm -rf dist && npm run build && node dist/src/infra/databases/setup/execute.js
scripts.restore-seed-db-win: powershell Remove-Item dist -Recurse -Force && npm run build && node dist/src/infra/databases/setup/execute.js
scripts.unit-test-linux: rm -rf dist && npm run build && jest --config jest.config.js
scripts.unit-test-win: powershell Remove-Item dist -Recurse -Force && npm run build && jest --config jest.config.js
